About

I live in Omaha with my amazing wife Jaci, and our two beagles, Felix and Oscar. I find great pleasure in making things from scratch, whether it's for home improvement, cooking, or mixing up a home brew. I'm also insanely competitive and a little mischievous - consider yourself warned.

Professionally

Lead Web Developer a Volano Solutions. I've spent stages of my career focusing on web application development, the business behind it, my clients, providing great customer service, or front-end development and design. I get to do all of this at the same time a Volano, and it's quite fulfilling.
